content.html: When I lived in Merthyr, our phone number was similar to that of Merthyr railway station. My dad used to keep a copy of the timetable next to the phone as we had a number of people inadvertently ringing our number. As most used phone boxes, he didn't want them to lose money.
content.value:
When I lived in Merthyr, our phone number was similar to that of Merthyr railway station.

My dad used to keep a copy of the timetable next to the phone as we had a number of people inadvertently ringing  our number.

As most used phone boxes, he didn't want them to lose money.
